title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' behavior in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui. Selecting xxx as destination.
OB: When copying a package in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui, if I select xxx as the destination, the package 'ui' is also included in the copied result.
EB: After copying a package in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui, only the selected package should be copied and not any additional packages.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui.
2. Select the package you want to copy.
3. Choose the 'Copy' option.
4. Specify xxx as the destination.
5. Verify that only the selected package is copied and no additional packages are included in the result.
